price: 1. Yallay Nabay maqaane как temcggee isi naqsul (Nabii Mucammad kinnuk) Qhuraanay cakkii kee baatil fanah baxsa oobise, seehadaa kee jinnih Yallih digaalák meesiise yakkemkeh.
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī nazzala al-fur'qāna ʿalā ʿabdihi liyakūna lil'ʿālamīna nadhīran
